    • log

      private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger log

  • Constructor Details

    • APISteps

      public APISteps()

  • Method Details

    • setAPI

      @Given("^I use the API named (.*?)$") public static void setAPI(String apiName)
      Loads an API based on the environment you are currently testing. Refer to the documentation in the sentinel.example project for more information.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I use the API named Agify API
      • I use the API named My API

      Parameters:
      apiName - name of the API object we want to use

    • setRequestBody

      @Given("I set the request body to") public static void setRequestBody(String body)
      Sets the body of the active API call to the string passed.
      Parameters:
      body - String the json to be passed as the body of the request.

    • setRequestBodyToMultipartFormDataForFileUpload

      @Given("^I set the request body to upload a file from the location (.*?) as a multipart/form-data with the name (.*?)") public static void setRequestBodyToMultipartFormDataForFileUpload(String fileToUploadPath, String multipartSegmentName) throws FileNotFoundException
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • loadRequestBody

      @Given("^I load (.*?) to use as the request body$") public static void loadRequestBody(String testdataName)
      Loads the indicated testdata located in the API object yaml file to use as the json for the body of the request.
      Parameters:
      testdataName - String the name of the testdata entry to use

    • addParameter

      @When("^I add an? (.*?) parameter with the value (.*?)$") public static void addParameter(String parameter, String value)
      Sets a query string parameter.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I add a status parameter with the value available
      • I add a name parameter with the value Bob
      • I add an address parameter with the value 143 Down Street

      Parameters:
      parameter - String the parameter to set
      value - String the value to set it

    • sendRequest

      @When("^I send a (DELETE|GET|POST|PUT) request to the (.*?) endpoint$") public static void sendRequest(String apiCallType, String endpoint)
      Sends a DELETE, GET, POST or PUT request to the specified endpoint.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I send a GET request to the pet/findByStatus endpoint
      • I send a POST request to the users endpoint
      • I send a PUT request to the amdins endpoint

      Parameters:
      apiCallType -
      endpoint -

    • sendRequest

      @When("^I (DELETE|GET) record (.*) from the (.*?) endpoint$") public static void sendRequest(String apiCallType, String parameter, String endpoint)
      Sends a GET or DELETE to the specified endpoint for the indicated record.

      Gherkin Examples:

      • I GET record 10 from the pet endpoint
      • I DELETE record bob from the user endpoint

      Parameters:
      apiCallType - String the type of call to make
      parameter - String the value to send to the endpoint
      endpoint - String the endpoint name as referenced in the swagger file

    • verifyResponseCodeEquals

      @When("^I verify the response code equals (\\d{3})$") public static void verifyResponseCodeEquals(int statusCode)
      Verify that the response code returned from the last API call is what we expect. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status
      Parameters:
      statusCode - int the status code expected

    • verifyResponseTime

      @When("^I verify the response was received in less than (\\d{1,2}(?:[.,]\\d{1,4})?) seconds?$") public static void verifyResponseTime(double time)

    • verifyResponseContains

      @Then("^I validate the response( does not)? (has|have|contains?) the text \"([^\"]*)\"$") public static void verifyResponseContains(String assertion, String matchType, String text)
      Validates text in an API response.
      Parameters:
      assertion - String null to see if the text exists, "does not" to see if it is absent
      matchType - String use "contains" for a partial match otherwise it will be an exact match
      text - String the text to match

    • addHeader

      @When("^I add an? (.*?) header with the value (.*?)$") public static void addHeader(String name, String value)
      Adds header into API request
      Parameters:
      name - String name of a header
      value - String value of the header

    • iInitializeTheData

      @When("I initialize the configuration values as follows") public void iInitializeTheData(String values)
      Adds the parsed string keys and values in Configuration for later use
      Parameters:
      values - String the string with keys and values Example: When I initialize the configuration values as follows """ id: 10 category_name: puppies """
